attributes.action: prohibit wholesalers, manufacturers and distributors selling direct to the public and retailers offering wholesale prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Blurring Lines Between Wholesalers and Retailers . 
A disturbing trend  is taking place on the internet in which traditional wholesalers, manufacturers and distributors are now selling directly to the public. Small store owners are now  being undercut by same businesses they have supported over many years.
At the same time more and more retail stores are offering wholesale prices direct to the public.
I think there should be a clear division between manufacturer, wholesale and retail financial transactions.
